entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Revelstoke
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 01:41 AM PST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -9.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Revelstoke Airport 08:00 AM PST Tuesday 31 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -9.6°C
Pressure: 102.8 kPa
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 91 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -10.8°C
Wind: SE 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 5.

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 7.
